snippet: Tightly scripted, majestic and, above all, red, China's 18th National Congress gets underway, as President Hu Jintao stresses "jianchi": persist, insist, persevere.
abstract: Tightly scripted, majestic and, above all, red, China's 18th National Congress gets underway, as President Hu Jintao stresses "jianchi": persist, insist, persevere.

headline.main: An Intimate Look Inside the 'Eighteenth Big'
